column2: "Juda no bɔn wɔdze dadze kyerɛwdze na dɛnkyɛmbo hwintsi akyerɛw: woekrukye no wɔ hɔn akoma pon
"ber a hɔn mba ka hɔn afɔrmbukyia na hɔn Aserim a ɔwowɔ ndua ebun ebun ase wɔ akoko sorɔnsorɔm do no."
"Me bepɔw a ewɔ wiramu
column3: medze w’ahodze na w’akoradze nyina bɛma ma wɔaafom afa

column2: "Na ɔwo
column4: ibegyaa egyapadze a medze maa wo no mu ato hɔ; na mebɛma akɔsom w’atamfo wɔ asaase a innyim no do: osiandɛ hom asɔ gya wɔ m’ebufuw mu a ɔbɛdzɛw daa."

column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi: Ndom nka ɔdasanyi biara a ɔtwer ɔdasanyi
column4: na n’akoma twe fi EWURADZE ho."

column2: "Na ɔbɛyɛ dɛ sar do duaba
column3: na sɛ yie ba a orunnhu. Ɔbɛtsena mbea a ayɛ kɛsɛɛ no do wɔ sar no do
column4: nkyen asaase a obi nntse do."

column2: "Osiarfo nye nyimpa a ɔdze noho twer EWURADZE
"Na ɔbɛyɛ dɛ dua a wɔatsɛw no wɔ nsu ho
column3: na ɔtsentsen no ndwow kɔ esutsen no nkyɛn
column6: na mbom n’ahaban bɛyɛ ebun ebun
column7: na nsuna afe nnkɛyɛ no asɛm

column2: "Akoma yɛ ɔdaadaafo kyɛn adze nyina
"Emi mara EWURADZE na mosɔ adwen hwɛ na mohwehwɛ akoma mu
column5: dɛ mbrɛ ne ndzeyɛe n’aba tse."

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ akokɔhwerɛw da nkyirefuwa a nnyɛ ɔno bi towee do tse no
column3: dɛm ara so na nyia ɔammfa tsenenee do nya ahonya no tse; ne nda ne finimfin no wobegya no hɔ

column2: "Ao enyimnyam ahengua
column3: wɔakrɔn no fir tsetse hɛn krɔnkrɔnbea!"

column2: "Ao EWURADZE
column3: Israel enyidado! Hɔn a wɔdan wo gya nyina enyi bɔto; hɔn a wofi wo nkyɛn kɔ no
column4: wɔbɛkyerɛw hɔn edzin aka asaase ase mba ho osiandɛ wɔadan EWURADZE

column2: "EWURADZE
column4: na mo ho bɛsan; gye me nkwa
column5: na mibenya nkwa: na ɔwo nye m’ayɛyi."

column2: "Hwɛ
column4: EWURADZE n’asɛm no wɔ hen? Ma ɔmbra ɛ!"

column2: "Emi dze memmpɛɛ ntsɛm minngyaae dɛ meyɛ oguanhwɛfo dzi w’ekyir: eso memmpɛɛ mbusu da no. Ɔwoara inyim dza ofiir m’ano no
"Mma nnyɛ ohuyifo mma me; ɔwo nye mo guandɔbea wɔ mbusu da no mu."
"Ma hɔn a wohiahia mo ho no hɔn enyi nto
column7: ma mma m’akoma nntu: fa mbusu da no bra hɔn do
column8: na fa ɔsɛɛ mbɔho sɛɛ hɔn."

column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE see me nye yi: Kɔ
column3: kegyina ɔman no ne mba hɔn aponkɛse a Juda ahemfo dzi mu akɔnaaba
column4: ɔnye Jerusalɛm aponkɛse no nyinara mu;"

column2: "na se hɔn dɛ
column5: na hɔn a wɔtse Jerusalɛm nyinara a wodua aponkɛse yi mu kɛhɛn mu

column2: "mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi; Hom nhwɛ hom ho yie
column3: na mma hom nnsoa adzesoa ahomgyeda anaaso wɔmmfa nndua Jerusalɛm aponkɛse mu mmba mu;"

column2: "eso mma hom nnsoa adzesoa mmfifi hom efiefi mu ahomgyeda
column3: eso mma hom nnyɛ edwuma biara; na mbom hom nyɛ ahomgyeda no krɔnkrɔn
column4: dɛ mbrɛ mehyɛɛ hom egyanom no;"

column2: "naaso woenntsie
"Na sɛ hom tsie me enyiberdo
column4: dɛ hom nnkɛfa adzesoa biara edua kurow yi n’aponkɛse mu ahomgyeda
column5: na mbom hom yɛ ahomgyeda no krɔnkrɔn
column6: dɛ hom nnkedzi dwuma biara wɔ mu a
column8: "ɔnodze ahemfo na mbapɔmba a wɔtsetse David akɔngua do no
column9: wobodua kurow yi aponkɛse mu ahɛn mu a wɔtsenatsena ntseaseanam mu na mpɔnkɔ do
column12: Juda mbarimba ɔnye hɔn a wɔtse Jerusalɛm: na kurow yi besi hɔ daa."

column2: "Na wofi Juda nkurow
column3: na mbeambea a abɔ Jerusalɛm ho aprɔw
column12: na wɔdze ndaase afɔrbɔdze aba EWURADZE fie."

column2: "Na sɛ hom enntsie me dɛ hom bɛyɛ ahomgyeda no krɔnkrɔn
column3: na hom nnkɔsoa adzesoa akɛhɛn Jerusalɛm aponkɛse no mu ahomgyeda a
column4: ɔnodze mobɔsɔ gya wɔ aponkɛse no mu
column5: na ɔahyew Jerusalɛm ahemfie no na worunndum no."
